channel.title: Posts on NALgen
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on NALgen

item.title: NALgen Analysis
item.description: The main purpose of this article is to break down the steps of the NALgen method, including multivariate analysis of genetic and environmental data and the spatial interpolation of neutral and adaptive genetic variation.

item.title: Landscape Genetic Simulations
item.description: The main purpose of this article is to break down the simulation steps: landscape generation and simulation of genotypes based on the generated landscapes.
